transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.
Customer: Haan main Chitra DJ showroom se bol raha tha.
Executive: Chitra DJ haanji bataiye sir.
Customer: Haan kya hai apna na update karna tha hum log kal paisa dale the.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Trust Trust Seal ke liye.
Executive: Haanji.
Customer: Haan to kya matlab baat karaiye na jaldi mein ya phir jo senior hai unke.
Executive: Aap mujhe 15 minute ka time de dijiye main aapko call arrange karwa deta hu abhi. Theek hai na kal bole the ki video update karna hai sab karke.
Customer: Theek hai. Aap mujhe 15 minute ka time de dijiye main call arrange karwa raha hu. Theek, theek, theek.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to update name and TrustSeal.

- Wants to talk to senior executive.



Resolution:

- Executive asked for 15 minutes to arrange call.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- trustseal, update, call arrangement
